entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diff in checked vs. release #98772
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Debugger timeout with deputy thread #98771
    9.0.0
  • Instrument type parameter could be restricted #98763
  • [browser][MT] Assertion: should not be reached at interp/transform.c:9055 #98758
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT failed with VS2022 17.9.0 Professional #98757
  • [API Proposal]: MetadataLoadContext.GetLoadContext(Assembly) #98756
  • [mono] mono_thread_detach hit assert #98751
  • JIT generates incorrect optimised code in .NET 8 #98748
    8.0.x
  • Suspended SystemSetting.exe cause PerformanceCounterCategory exception:System.InvalidOperationException: Category does not exist #98746
  • Tiered JIT changes behavior of code in the absence of explicit conv.r4 #98745
  • Incorrect CFI unwinding information in ARM64 assembly helpers #98738
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose dotnet info by introducing a new hostfxr API #98735
  • Test failure Assert.All() Failure: 12 out of 256 items in the collection did not pass #98732
    9.0.0
  • MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method #98730
    9.0.0

Closed

  • C# Docker container System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Resource temporarily unavailable (<URL>:4003) #98780
  • Changing SSL Certificate Without Closing Connection #98304
  • Reachable assert in ECDiffieHellmanCng #95886
    9.0.0
  • win-x64 SPMI asmdiffs failing #98759
    9.0.0
  • STJ source generator doesn't escape property names #98638
    Future
  • JsonNode.Parse() fails to parse stream containing JSON with a comment #98765
  • [Wasm] Very large methods cause interpreter tiering to fail and allocates a lot of unmanaged memory #93192
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] AdvSimd.Arm64 [Load/Store]Vector64 and [Load/Store]Vector128 for 2,3 and 4 variants with LLVM #93081
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Setting `WasmBuildNative` to false produces no output wasm binary #96863
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected result from evaluated method #96416
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Safe API for covariant cast of ReadOnlySpan<T> #96952
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/12/2024 12:30:28 AM #98708
  • Performance changes related to vzeroupper emit changes #98705
  • C# HttpListener will show ObjectDisposedException if you stop listen after start listen immediately #96705
  • Freeing up memory from ArrayPools #10099
    Future
  • SuperPMI asm diffs and metrics improvement #52877
    Future
  • Package Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection 8.0.0 is not compatible with net80-android #98541
  • [API Proposal]: Why filesystem APIs like `Directory.CreateDirectory`. `DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles`, `File.Create` etc... not `async` #98736
  • Workloads-NoWebcil-Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.DebugLevelTests timeout #98734
  • Consider moving some bits of Emscripten property checks and setup to the WorkloadManifest package. #89482
    9.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #94968
    9.0.0
  • Unhandled exception. System.Exception: Profilee returned exit code 139 instead of expected exit code 100 #98500
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the correct IfaceImpl in TypeMapInfo #98782
  • Remove bash dep from init scripts #98781
  • Enable RLCSE experiment in the perf lab #98779
  • Add info in docs about diagnosing Build Analysis failures #98778
  • JIT: test the new cse policy in jit-experimental #98777
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
  • SPMI: Handle PerfScore=0 edge case #98775
  • [NO MERGE] PR benchmark playground v2 #98770
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #98749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors of the struct argument parsing in LoongArch64PassStructInRegister.cs #98744
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [WIP] datas tuning fix #98743
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Optimize the overflow check for `GT_ADD` and `GT_SUB` in emitter::emitInsTernary(). #98742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assertion error for DynamicHelpers::CreateDictionaryLookupHelper(). #98741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix missing relocations in NativeAOT x86 output #98740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98731
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set Optimize in ILLink analyzer project #98727
    area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • [PERF] Reenable PerfBDN Android testing #98769
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix an infinite loop in eglib. #98774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add runtime-dev-innerloop to Build Analysis tracking #98768
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: refactor CSE to allow running greedy ML heuristic in release #98729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more ZapDisable/ZapRequire references #98569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use MethodInvoker in ReflectionPropertyFetch #98739
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Removing GT_STORE_DYN_BLK, part 1 #98733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return null for ECDSA keys from GetECDiffieHellmanPrivateKey #98725
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Fix rich debug info reporting with failed inline contexts #98755
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handle dumping for AOT scenarios #98728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor the generic TensorPrimitives implementation into multiple files. #98566
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Read csv files output by superpmi as UTF8 #98760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix source gen support for custom property names that need escaping #98750
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] cleanup #98672
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Allocate basic block link array in exponential fashion #98701
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT ARM64_SVE: Add IF_SVE_BR_3A to IF_SVE_EX_3A #98722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement ReadOnlySpan.CastUp #98395
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use the same code to emit Vector/Vector<T> intrinsics on … #98317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Add a unified mechanism to track metadata/metrics about the compilation #98653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98677
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Fold more casts #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify StoreSelectedScalar #98710
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove GenTreeBlk::BlkOpKindHelper #98682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix profiler multiple test #98685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #98726
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • [no merge] Draft: infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add correct ImplementingType and InterfaceImpl to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #98525
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Bump NuGet.ProjectModel version #98724
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Intrinsify ClearWithoutReferences and Fill #98700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter: Place unboxing section along other TEXT sections #97960
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [NO-MERGE] Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add back optimization of Encode using arm64 load/store/vectortablelookup #98719
    needs-area-label
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Improve alternation switch optimization in regex source generator #98723
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
